about_the_game:
You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game. Inspired by the humor of Men in Black and Jackie Chan films, this over-the-top adventure challenges you to eliminate the mafia that has seized control of New York in a single night. Because your codename is too long, everyone simply calls you “Agent” as you go building by building, taking down dangerous mafia bosses. Can you deliver it?

Leap over obstacles, run on walls, perform aerial flips, and swoop down on enemies using your grappling hook. Unlock new weapons to experiment with different strategies, rip your foes apart, and conquer each stage at record speed. Climb the leaderboards as you rack up high scores!

  • Stylized Parkour System: Swiftly navigate mafia warehouses with wall-runs, quick dashes, and a grappling hook.

  • Dynamic Combat: Mix and match ranged and melee weapons—like pistols and axes—to suit your playstyle.

  • Momentum-Based Gameplay: Chain uninterrupted parkour moves and stylish kills to earn bigger rewards.

  • Mafia Boss Showdowns: Face off against uniquely themed bosses, each sporting distinct fighting styles and personalities.

  • Progression System: Level up to unlock perks and mutators, customizing your approach and unleashing your full potential.

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains frequent stylized violence, including depictions of blood, intense combat sequences, and brutal finishers. Alcohol and tobacco usage are referenced within the context of certain mafia factions, but no explicit drug usage is shown. The game does not include any nudity, sexual content, or self-harm depictions. Players should be aware that the intense action and graphic combat may not be suitable for younger audiences.

Inspired by the humor of Men in Black and Jackie Chan films, this over-the-top adventure challenges you to eliminate the mafia that has seized control of New York in a single night. Because your codename is too long, everyone simply calls you “Agent” as you go building by building, taking down dangerous mafia bosses. Can you deliver it?

Leap over obstacles, run on walls, perform aerial flips, and swoop down on enemies using your grappling hook. Unlock new weapons to experiment with different strategies, rip your foes apart, and conquer each stage at record speed. Climb the leaderboards as you rack up high scores!

  • Stylized Parkour System: Swiftly navigate mafia warehouses with wall-runs, quick dashes, and a grappling hook.

name: You Have A Delivery

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1060 or AMD RX 580
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4460 or AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia RTX 2060 or AMD RX 5600 XT
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:
Violência Extrema
Drogas ilícitas
Linguagem imprópria

short_description: You Have A Delivery is a stylized, fast-paced FPS action game, inspired by action-comedy films. Take down the mafia in one night: rip apart your enemies, unlock guns and perks, and deliver unstoppable chaos. You're the only one who can pull it off. Can you deliver it?
supported_languages:
English*, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Japanese, Korean, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Turkish
*languages with full audio support
